about: Working as Frontend Engineer on internal project as well as client-facing web apps.

company: Full Stack Developer @ ALLPS Digital GmbH
about: I've been working in a Zurich based startup where my responsibility varies for several projects as full stack developer and as frontend developer on some using ReactJs + Redux + NodeJs and VueJS + Laravel.
Built a livestream using MEAN stack and Alicloud as the streaming server. Worked with various web video encoders and decoders written in C++ and running on Nodejs

Built the frontend of a SaaS based platform for construction engineers to manage their blueprints, material, workers and progress using Angular and Leaflet.js. Wrote tests using Mocha, Chai and Puppeteer.

heading: Letscode React Scheduler
about: Letscode is a webapp which allows you to keep track of all competitive programming contests across Hackerrank, Codeforces, TopCoder, CodeChef, HackerEarth etc.

heading: Memory Sequences
about: A web app for blogging with everything written from scratch. Made this to teach myself Angular 4 + Typescript.

heading: Time My Show
about: A progressive web app to search and subscribe to tv shows for new episodes of all subscribed shows sorted.

heading: Ionic Messenger (iOS/Android)
about: A chat app made for android and iOS for demonstrating obscure features such as going private with another user, giving a specific time to a message etc.

heading: Whatsapp Daemon (team of 2)
about: A web app tool for bypassing whatsapp restrictions and getting automatic notifications when user comes online, changes status, changes profile pic or their last hour activity.

heading: Chart App #2 (IPL Stats)
about: A web app for demonstration of certain chart.js elements while comparing the real life data of IPL matches from 2008 till 2016.

heading: One Hot True
about: A neural net trained on mnist dataset to recognize digits from 28x28 images using Tensorflow without using convolutional model (accuracy ~ 95%) .

heading: Code Scrapper
about: A desktop app for Linux, Windows and Mac to download code from competitive programming websites.

heading: Instacode Online Judge
about: An online compiler and judge where algorithmic problems are to be solved under contrained memory and time limit.

heading: Creek
about: A simple web app to keep track of new albums from bands you love. No manually adding bands, just use last.fm credentials and know when a new album drops with all it's info.

heading: SAE KIET
about: Official website for a college club SAE KIET (mech. engineering) re-written in AngularJs.

heading: Code Hour
about: Code Hour is an open-source webapp which allows you to keep track of competitive programming contests across all websites.

heading: Instanotes
about: A website that lets students from my college as well as from other Engineering colleges search for class notes.

about: A webapp to demonstrate various types of charts and graphs using FusionCharts API. Supports JSON & CSV formats.
